name: Lua

skills.name: Splinter Arrow
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Deals 50% of the inflicted damage to all enemies if this attack is critical.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%

skills.name: Hail of Arrows
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies 3 times. Each critical hit heals this Champion by 2.5% HP.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Lucky Shot
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. This attack fully depletes the Turn Meter. Will ignore [Shield] and [Block Damage] buffs.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1
